answer.text: Waaaaaaaitaminnit! The Eiffel Tower isn't in JAPAN!

question.text: You are running a race and you pass the person in second place. You're in the lead!!!!!!!?

answer.text: Noooooo, now YOU'RE in second place!

question.text: A lion in Africa and a giraffe in Europe and a zebra in France are in the same zoo.

answer.text: Waaaaaaitamminnit... They can't be in the same zoo, they're on different continents!
Waaaaaaaitaminnit! The Taj Mahal isn't in GREECE!
Waaaaaaaitaminnit! Big Ben isn't in NEW YORK!

question.text: A rooster lays an egg on the roof. Which side does it roll down?
Tim's mother has four children: North, East, and South. What is the name of the fourth child?

answer.text: It's 'Tim'! It's right there in the question! It's the first word! THE FIRST WORD!!!
